name: The Pairing - Space Game
description:
The Pairing - Space Game

This is one half of the #TwoGamesJam2021 submission "The Pairing", which you can play over here.

01 - Falcon

You are the captain of the 01-Falcon - get it through the Borgon cluster safely. Mind the asteroids.

ControlKeyMovementArrow keys
Reset LevelEscape Credits

Thanks to Antti Luode for the musical piece "Aloude Tunefish" 🤍
